MPC

Class Type

  • java.lang.Object
    • MPC.ASTNode
      • MPC.Type
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypeArray, TypeError, TypeId, TypeObject, TypePointer, TypePrim, TypeProcFunc, TypeRange, TypeRecord

    public abstract class Type
extends ASTNode
    Abstract Representation of a type in the Pascal language as defined by the Pascal User Manual and Report.
    Version:
    1.0
